attributes.action: Stop Violence Against Women. Self-Defence. Pepper Spray. Abusers Lists.
attributes.additional_details: Two women a week are killed by a current or former partner in England and Wales alone. An estimated 1.6 million women experienced domestic abuse in the year ending March 2019. Police received a domestic abuse call every 30 seconds in the first seven weeks of lockdown. 97% of young women have been sexually harassed. Approximately 85,000 women experience rape/attempted rape/sexual assault by penetration in England and Wales every year.
attributes.background: End violence against women. Abusers must stop. Immediate deterrents and self-defence strategies are needed. Legalise Pepper Spray for women. Teach girls Martial Arts in schools. Publish a National Abusers Register. #ViolenceIsntOnSoHANDSOFF #LetsMakeItZero #HANDSOFF www.handsoffcampaign.com

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a national register of offenders who commit crimes against females: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579602

Make it legal to carry non-lethal self defence weapons: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568

Mandatory self-defence classes as part of school curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578987

Fund free self-defence classes for women in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578919
